content: these cute little birds can be made really easily in an hour or so the only sewing required is to close the top of the head and attach the eyes afterwards as everything else is integrated as you work suitable for advanced beginner/intermediate level 4 page written pattern this pattern is my original pattern by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission it is for personal use only it is permitted to make items from this pattern to sell for charitable purposes provided they meet safety guidelines and crochet at teri s is accredited
